system.requirements:
Tier 1; Fellowship 30, not an Ogryn 
Aptitudes: Fellowship, General
system.effect:
Character scores +2 Degrees of Success whenever suceeding on a Fellowship-Based Test directed at an Ogryn.
Ogryn Allies may reroll any failed Tests to resist Coercion or other inducement to betray or turn against the Character.

description.value: Character scores +2 Degrees of Success whenever suceeding on a Fellowship-Based Test directed at an Ogryn. Ogryn Allies may reroll any failed Tests to resist Coercion or other inducement to betray or turn against the Character.
